languages.text: "И все же вы не оставили меня во тьме, хоть и могли. Не лишили жизни, хоть ваше сердце и сжали антрацитовые тиски, а разум укутался в пунцовые сети". {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, стараясь прикрыть жгучий стыд всполохом растрепанных волос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И все же вы не оставили меня во тьме, хоть и могли. Не лишили жизни, хоть ваше сердце и сжали антрацитовые тиски, а разум укутался в пунцовые сети". {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, стараясь прикрыть жгучий стыд всполохом растрепанных волос.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И все же вы не оставили меня во тьме, хоть и могли. Не лишили жизни, хоть ваше сердце и сжали антрацитовые тиски, а разум укутался в пунцовые сети". {n}Кассия отводит взгляд, стараясь прикрыть жгучий стыд всполохом растрепанных волос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of disheveled hair.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could. traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “尽管你可以将我遗弃在黑暗之中，但你并没有这么做。即便你的心被深黑色的卡钳夹住，理智被缠绕在深红色的罗网中时，你也并没有夺走我的生命。”{n}卡西娅转过了头，似乎打算将她熊熊燃烧的羞耻感掩盖在她凌乱的长发之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “尽管你可以将我遗弃在黑暗之中，但你并没有这么做。即便你的心被深黑色的卡钳夹住，理智被缠绕在深红色的罗网中时，你也并没有夺走我的生命。”{n}卡西娅转过了头，似乎打算将她熊熊燃烧的羞耻感掩盖在她凌乱的长发之中。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no me abandonó en la oscuridad aunque podía. No puso fin a mi vida ni cuando su corazón era presa del negro carbón y su raciocinio estaba atrapado en una telaraña carmesí». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, intentando ocultar su vergüenza tras una mata de pelo desaliñado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, no me abandonó en la oscuridad aunque podía. No puso fin a mi vida ni cuando su corazón era presa del negro carbón y su raciocinio estaba atrapado en una telaraña carmesí». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, intentando ocultar su vergüenza tras una mata de pelo desaliñado.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それでも、あなたは暗闇の中で私を見捨てませんでした。そうできたとしても。心臓が黒炭のような悪徳に支配され、理性が深紅の網に絡め取られても、あなたは私の人生を終わらせませんでした」{n}カシアは目をそらし、乱れた髪の陰に燃えるような羞恥心を隠そうとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それでも、あなたは暗闇の中で私を見捨てませんでした。そうできたとしても。心臓が黒炭のような悪徳に支配され、理性が深紅の網に絡め取られても、あなたは私の人生を終わらせませんでした」{n}カシアは目をそらし、乱れた髪の陰に燃えるような羞恥心を隠そうとする。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und doch habt Ihr mich nicht in der Dunkelheit zurückgelassen, obwohl Ihr das hättet tun können. Ihr habt mein Leben nicht beendet, obwohl Euer Herz im Griff einer pechschwarzen Schraubzwinge klemmte und Eure Vernunft in einem roten Netz verstrickt war." {n}Cassia wendet die Augen ab und versucht, ihre brennende Scham hinter ihren zerzausten Haaren zu verbergen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und doch habt Ihr mich nicht in der Dunkelheit zurückgelassen, obwohl Ihr das hättet tun können. Ihr habt mein Leben nicht beendet, obwohl Euer Herz im Griff einer pechschwarzen Schraubzwinge klemmte und Eure Vernunft in einem roten Netz verstrickt war." {n}Cassia wendet die Augen ab und versucht, ihre brennende Scham hinter ihren zerzausten Haaren zu verbergen.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Et pourtant, vous ne m'avez pas abandonnée dans les ténèbres. Vous n'avez pas mis fin à ma vie malgré l'étau d'un noir de jais qui vous enserrait le cœur et la toile écarlate qui altérait votre raison. » {n}Cassia détourne le regard pour essayer de cacher la honte qui la dévore derrière ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et pourtant, vous ne m'avez pas abandonnée dans les ténèbres. Vous n'avez pas mis fin à ma vie malgré l'étau d'un noir de jais qui vous enserrait le cœur et la toile écarlate qui altérait votre raison. » {n}Cassia détourne le regard pour essayer de cacher la honte qui la dévore derrière ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Beni karanlıkta terk edebilirdin ancak öyle yapmadın. Kalbini kapkara bir is bürümesine, aklına kan kırmızısı bir ağ dokunmasına rağmen canımı almadın." {n}Cassia gözlerini kaçırıyor. İçindeki acı utancı, saçının dağınıklığı ve yüzündeki şaşkınlıkla saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet you did not abandon me in the darkness, even though you could have. You did not end my life even though your heart was in the grip of a coal-black vice, and your reason was enmeshed in a crimson web." {n}Cassia averts her eyes, trying to hide her burning shame behind her shock of dishevelled hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gelgelelim beni karanlıkta terk edebilirdin ancak öyle yapmadın. Kalbini kapkara bir is bürümesine, aklına kan kırmızısı bir ağ dokunmasına rağmen canımı almadın." {n}Cassia gözlerini kaçırıyor. İçindeki acı utancı; saçının dağınıklığı ve yüzündeki şaşkınlıkla saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
